title: Were the absent ballot papers returned to some voters as "not delivered "?
subtitle: According to reports from Ohio and Georgia, the United States Securities Agency rejected the ballot papers that had been mailed in envelopes provided by the Government.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: A voter in Chatham district, Georgia, returned a ballot card by post and was listed as "non-Muslim," although it was intended for the People's Party, which was approved by the province. Box
